name: name
title: Name may contain only letters, apostrophe, dash and spaces. For example Adrian, Jacob Mercer, Charles de Batz de Castelmore d'Artagnan

name: number
title: Phone number must be digits and can contain spaces, dashes, parentheses and can start with +

name: email
title: Email addresses must be in the following order: characters@characters.domain (characters followed by an @ sign, followed by more characters, and then a '.'. After the '.' sign, add at least 2 letters from a to z
